title: John Grisham - The Summons
description:
The master of the legal thriller carries listeners deep into Mississippi for a story of politics, power, and family secrets.

Sick, reclusive, and near death, old Judge Atlee has called his two sons back to their ancestral home in Clanton, Mississippi, to explain the directives of his estate. Before the sons arrive, Atlee dies, leaving behind the document written and signed in his own hand. But he has left something else behind: a lucrative secret that will put his heirs in grave danger.
